meanings.definition: In a lazy or idle manner.
meanings.sent1: He wandered shiftlessly around the house, not doing any chores.
meanings.sent2: She sat shiftlessly on the couch, watching TV all day.
meanings.sent3: The cat yawned shiftlessly, clearly uninterested in catching the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The clouds moved shiftlessly across the sky, in no hurry to reach their destination.
meanings.sent5: The old man moved shiftlessly, taking his time with each step.

meanings.sent1: The shiftlessly student never bothered to study for exams.
meanings.sent2: Her shiftlessly attitude towards work led to her being passed over for promotions.
meanings.sent3: The shiftlessly sloth just lazed around in the tree all day.
meanings.sent4: The shiftlessly river meandered through the valley, never striving to reach the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The shiftlessly worker barely completed any tasks, always finding excuses to avoid work.

meanings.sent1: The shiftlessly employee never met deadlines and often left work unfinished.
meanings.sent2: The shiftlessly gardener neglected the plants, causing them to wither away.
meanings.sent3: The shiftlessly child half-heartedly attempted to clean his room, only making a bigger mess.
meanings.sent4: The shiftlessly wind barely rustled the leaves, showing no strength in its movement.
meanings.sent5: The shiftlessly painter sloppily applied brush strokes, resulting in a messy artwork.
